task: Find the pronunciation and a sample sentence for the word \"pandemic.\","https://dictionary.cambridge.org/
observation:
The most recent observation shows that the Cambridge Dictionary page for the word "pandemic" provides both the UK and US pronunciations along with several example sentences. The pronunciation is indicated as /pænˈdem.ɪk/ for both UK and US. Example sentences included are:

- "In some parts of the world malaria is still pandemic."
- "A report on pandemic flu released last year said 'the potential for catastrophe is immense.'"

Additional contexts and meanings are also available on the page. This summary reflects the latest observations only; refer to the complete task history for full details.
